Notation

referent

the object pointed to in the smart pointer. Also called "pointee".

referent_type

the referent's type.

scalar smart pointer (SSP)

A smart pointer referring to a single instance of the referent_type.

smart pointer pointer construct (SPPC)

This refers to any data type, whether primitive (e.g. a raw pointer to a scalar smart pointer SSP) or composite (e.g. a vector of scalar smart pointers) which can access some number of scalar smart pointers through a raw pointer to some dynamically allocated object.
